Yeeum

ODD YOUTH

Introduction

Yeeum is a South Korean singer under TOP MEDIA.

She was revealed as a member of the girl group ODD YOUTH on September 27, 2024. She debuted with them on November 1, 2024, with the release of their first single "Best Friendz".
